Title: Relates to operating a vessel while intoxicated when a child who is fifteen years of age or less is a passenger in such vessel
Summary: Relates to operating a vessel while intoxicated when a child who is fifteen years of age or less is a passenger in such vessel.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the navigation law and the penal law, in relation to operating a vessel while intoxicated when a child who is fifteen years of age or less is a passenger in such vessel
